participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Determined and imaginative, with a hint of wistfulness about the past.
participant_1.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and hardworking, with a deep connection to his rural roots.
participant_2.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town.

content.text: I want to be a lawyer. And you?
